channel.title: Moving Npc's
channel.description: Hi im moving my source to edgeville... ive just moved all the portals and now im moving the npc's.. how do i move the npc's? im looking rite now so i mite find it but please post and tell me :) thanks![br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 25, 2008, 12:20:39 PM[/size][hr].[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 25, 2008, 12:24:45 PM[/size][hr].[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 25, 2008, 12:33:45 PM[/size][hr].[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 25, 2008, 12:37:10 PM[/size][hr].

item.title: Moving Npc's
item.dc:creator: @pkinnubpk pkinnubpk
item.description:
@pkinnubpk wrote:

Hi im moving my source to edgeville… ive just moved all the portals and now im moving the npc’s… how do i move the npc’s? im looking rite now so i mite find it but please post and tell me thanks![br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 25, 2008, 12:20:39 PM[/size][hr].[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 25, 2008, 12:24:45 PM[/size][hr].[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 25, 2008, 12:33:45 PM[/size][hr].[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 25, 2008, 12:37:10 PM[/size][hr].
